description:
The Atmospheric Radiation Measurement Program developed a value added product that could run autonomously to
determine planetary boundary height using radiosondes. This product has produced data for 117 unique sites and
facilities for more than 10 years. The initial software was released around 2013 and data has been produced since 2001 for
some sites.
name: ARM-DOE/adi-vap-pblhtsonde
